DOC.detailed_description: This study limit child adolescent age 5-18 undergoing tonsillectomy indication obstructive sleep disturbance ( snore , choking/gasping pause breathe sleep . ) Study participant randomize two group : study medication ( Lansoprazole ) inactive substance ( placebo ) . Participants ask follow : 1 . Take study medication twice day 14 day . 2 . Keep log book include : - Record medication amount medication take day 14 day . This include pain medication study drug . - Record child 's activity level daily 14 day . - Collect child 's urine one time daily test use special medicate strip monitor daily liquid intake 14 day . 3 . Meet Research Assistant Study Physician 14-21 day study collect log book perform post-operative examination .
